Release 3.0.0 - 2012-08-xx

TypeChangesBy

Target Java 7.mhm

Release 2.7.0 - 2012-06-12

TypeChangesBy

Svnkit Updated from 1.3.1 to 1.7.4-v1. Worked out-of-the box, no source changes required.mhm

Metadata serialization: No characters entities for chars 128-255.mhm

Use standard TransformerFactory.mhm

Node.deleteFile and deleteDirectory added. Node.delete and deleteOpt renamed to deleteTree and deleteTreeOpt.mhm

Node.readProperties and Node.writeProperties added.mhm

Node.writeXml with format parameter.mhm

Node.writeTo(OutputStream dest, long skip) added. SshNode.get renamed to writeTo.mhm

Update jsch 1.42 to 1.48 and fix problems for files with glob characters.mhm

Buffer methods return counts as long values now.mhm

Release 2.6.3 - 2012-05-10

TypeChangesBy

Fix SvnNode.urlFromWorkspace: svn 1.7 does not necessarily have an .svn directory.mhm

Release 2.6.2 - 2012-01-29

TypeChangesBy

Add IntBitSet.with method.mhm

ZipNode.length for a none-existing node throws an LengthException now.mlhartme

Dump Util.split.mlhartme

Release 2.6.1 - 2011-09-17

TypeChangesBy

Fix OS detection when running on OpenJdk 7 for Mac OS/X BSD Port.mlhartme

MkfileException messages fixed (was mkdir failed).mlhartme

Fix FileNode.delete() for links pointing to files or directories that you cannot change.mlhartme

SshNode.root() and File.root() now throw an IllegalArgumentException when called with an initial slash.mlhartme

Release 2.6.0 - 2011-07-04

TypeChangesBy

Added a Separator class to split Strings and join Objects.mlhartme

Removed Strings.split, Strings.join, Strings.trim and Strings.next. Use the new Separator class instead: change Strings.split(separator, arg) calls to Separator.on(separator).split(arg); change Strings.join(separator, args) calls to Separator.on(separator).join(args).mlhartme

Removed Strings.lines(), use Separator.RAW_LINE.split() instead.mlhartme

Renamed Filesystem.SEPARATOR to SEPARATOR_STRING; added a new Separator SEPARATOR.mlhartme

Dump OS.listSeparatorChar, changed listSeparator from String to Separator. Also changed OS.lineSeparator from String to Separator.mlhartme

Removed Settings.join and changed Settings.lineSeparator from String to Separator.mlhartme

Removed Filesystem.split(), use Filesystem.SEPARATOR.split() instead.mlhartme

Removed Strings.separator(), use Separator.split instead.mlhartme

Removed Filter.SEPARATOR and SEPARATOR_CHAR; use Filesystem constants instead.mlhartme

Renamed Strings.removeStart, removeStartOpt, removeEnd and removeEndOpt to removeLeft, removeLeftOpt, removeRight and removeRightOpt.mlhartme

Removed Stings.stripExtension(name, extWithoutDot), use Strings.removeEndOpt(name, extWithDot) instead.mlhartme

Moved Strings.getFileExtension to Node.getExtension.mlhartme

Renamed Strings.lfill() and rfill() to padLeft() and padRight(); aligned arguments with remove methods.mlhartme

Launcher: stdin is configurable now (and defaults to System.in).mlhartme

Launcher: uses internal buffer and encoding variable now (instead of world buffer and settings).mlhartme

Launcher: fix PumpStream to copy more than one line.mlhartme

Release 2.5.1 - 2011-06-24

TypeChangesBy

Configurable namespace context for xml selector.mlhartme

Fix indentation in xml serializer (2 spaces, was 0).mlhartme

Release 2.5.0 - 2011-06-20

TypeChangesBy

Fix missing authentication on exporting from an SvnNode - now uses AuthenticationManager supplied to backing SVNRepository.matiam

Program renamed to Launcher, moved from util to launcher package, and completely reworked: all fields are private now, and there's only one getter for the builder; added an env() and a dir() method; renamed add() to arg() and addAll() to args(); exec supports an optional error stream now; throws a ProgramException now, ExitCode derives from ProgramException.mlhartme

Added SvnFilesystem methods to get and set the defaultAuthenticationManager.mlhartme

SvnNode.fromWorkspace(arg) also works for file args now.mlhartme

Release 2.4.1 - 2011-05-27

TypeChangesBy

Fix "Target server failed to respond", caused by a HEAD method that tries to read the response body.mlhartme

Multi-threading unit tests and fixes.mlhartme

Fix WebdavNode connection leaks.mlhartme

SshNode.delete() failed for deeply nested directories because every level opened a new channel.mlhartme

Release 2.4.0 - 2011-05-11

TypeChangesBy

Always use / in paths; World.file() methods expect filePaths (with platform separators), not paths.mlhartme

Changed FileNode.toString() to resemble File.toString(); no longer returns file uris.mlhartme

Dumped Filesystem.separator and separatorChar. Use Filesystem.SEPARATOR(_CHAR) instead. Or, when dealing with file paths, File.separator(Char).mlhartme

Clarify Root.getId() and fix it for Windows.mlhartme

Various Windows fixes.mlhartme

Multi-threading unit tests and fixes.mlhartme

SshRoot.getChannel() changed to allocSftpChannel and freeSftpChannel().mlhartme

Dump SshNode.getChannel().mlhartme

Moved ZipNode.encodePath and decodePath to Node.mlhartme

Release 2.3.0 - 2011-04-06

TypeChangesBy

Merge Misc class into Util.mlhartme

Xml now creates members on demand.mlhartme

Dump Util.absoluteFile.mlhartme

Archive.save() no longer creates an "/" entry.mlhartme

Fix ZipRoot.list() for archives with an "/" entry.mlhartme

fs.Copy: improved ReflectionException message.mlhartme

Fix ZipNode URI encoding problems in constructor and getURI().mlhartme

Fix WebdavNode.equals to also compare queries.mlhartme

Fix Filesystem.join(String ...) to skip empty parts.mlhartme

Release 2.2.2 - 2011-03-11

TypeChangesBy

ZipNode.isDirectory() fixed.mlhartme

Node.list() properly throws a ListException with wrapped FileNotFoundException if the respective node does not exist.mlhartme

Properly report unknown scheme if jsch dependency is not available (only for specific Java versions).mlhartme

Release 2.2.1 - 2011-03-04

TypeChangesBy

Properly report unknown scheme if http core client dependency is not available.mlhartme

Release 2.2.0 - 2011-02-15

TypeChangesBy

Changed groupId and packages from com.oneandone.sushi to net.sf.beezle.sushi. Bumped minor version number to indicate this incompatible change.mlhartme

OnShutdown.deleteNow() added.mlhartme

Release 2.1.0 - 2011-02-08

TypeChangesBy

Added Node.resolveLink().mlhartme

Renamed IO to World, simplified creation and dump META-INF filesystem descriptor.mlhartme

Rename World.stringNode to World.memoryNode, add method for bytes.mlhartme

World.getWorking() may be null now.mlhartme

Serializer.escapeEntities now properly reports illegal characters.mlhartme

Move Node.getAbsolute() down to FileNode.mlhartme

Precise return types for getParent and join in als Nodes.mlhartme

World.node now rejects relative uris.mlhartme

Support webdav URIs with queries.mlhartme

Support dots and double dots in Node.join.mlhartme

Renamed Node.hasAnchestor to Node.hasDifferenceAnchestor(). Added Node.hasAnchestor() that returns true for this.mlhartme

Improved node.toString().mlhartme

Node.getRootNode() added.mlhartme

Dump node base, use World.getWorking() instead.mlhartme

Distinguish dav(s) and http(s) schemes.mlhartme

WebdavNode.getUrl() dumped, use Node.getURI() instead.mlhartme

Changed groupId and packages from de.ui.sushi to com.oneandone.sushi. Bumped minor version number to indicate this incompatible change.mlhartme

Strings.split now throws an IllegalArgumentException for empty separator strings.mlhartme

LineReader: separator is a pattern now (it was a string); exclude pattern instead of empty and comment flagsmlhartme

SshNodes: native append, no longer read old content before appending.mlhartme

Move Archive.unzip/unjar to FileNode.unzip/unjar.mlhartme

Fix URI encoding/decoding problems in MemoryNode, WebdavNode, ZipNode, SshNode and SvnNode. In particular, you can now properly instantiate URIs like "jar:file:/foo%20bar/lib/build/dist.jar!/eclipse.template"mlhartme

Fix globbing characters in SshNode file names.mlhartme

Fix typo unkown -> unknown in various string constants.mlhartme

Release 2.0.6 - 2010-08-18

TypeChangesBy

Some methods added to Dom class.mlhartme

Release 2.0.5 - 2010-07-02

TypeChangesBy

pom.xml: use fixed plugin versions.mlhartme

Improved WebdavNode.exists(): always use head requests.mlhartme

Fix WebdavNode.getType() for Nexus 1.7.0 servers.mlhartme

Release 2.0.4 - 2010-06-18

TypeChangesBy

metadata.Type.loadXml: Fix systemId used to parse xml files.mlhartme

Cli parser: a single "-" is always a value now, not an option with empty name.mlhartme

Release 2.0.3 - 2010-04-23

TypeChangesBy

SvnFilesystem.setCredentials() renamed to setDefaultCredentials().mlhartme

Release 2.0.2 - 2010-04-13

TypeChangesBy

String Node.getLocator() changed to URI Node.getURI(). FileNode.toURI() dumped.mlhartme

Optimized Ssh Credentials Handling.mlhartme

SvnNode: dump svn status and changelog generation, they're to specific.mlhartme

FileNode: Fix URI to file conversion problems with blanks.mlhartme

Node: Renamed RootPathException to NodeInstantiationException. The new exception always has an URI argument.mlhartme

IO.node(String) no longer wraps URISyntaxException in RootPathException. If you know your syntax is valid, you can invoke validNode(String) instead.mlhartme

Add extra argument to IO.node and Filesystem.node to pass configuration options.mlhartme

SvnFilesystem: you can now pass credentials as part of the url.mlhartme

Dump special handling of $ characters in webdav nodes.mlhartme

More accurate throws clause for Node.checkFile() and checkDirectory(): ExistsException and FileNotFoundException instead of IOException.mlhartme

IO.resources() now throws an IllegalStateException for duplicate classpath items.mlhartme

Dump IO.node(URL), use URI method instead.mlhartme

Dump InstantiateException, it's no longer needed because Node construction can no longer fail.mlhartme

Dump LocatorException, RootPathException is thrown instead. As a consequence, IO.node throws a RootPathException now.mlhartme

Replaced LineProcessor by LineReader which is easier to use and allows to easily read lines without trimmed separators. Dumped LineCollector.mlhartme

Node.writeStrings() and appendStrings added that take multiple string arguments.mlhartme

LineProcessor: changed boolean trim parameter to enum with values NOTHING, SEPARATOR (was false) and ALL (was true).mlhartme

FileNode.exec() and execNoOutput() added.mlhartme

LineCollector: make result array configurable.mlhartme

Release 2.0.1 - 2010-02-12

TypeChangesBy

IO.node() created node in parent directory of the current working directory.mlhartme

Release 2.0.0 - 2010-02-02

TypeChangesBy

Moved all packages from org.qooxdoo.sushi to de.ui.sushi.mlhartme

Moved compiler module back to Mork Project.mlhartme

Merged ssh- and svn modules into core module, making their dependencies optional.mlhartme

Turned multi-module-build (with the only remaining module (core)) into a normal build.mlhartme

Added Strings.escape() method.mlhartme

Added Strings.toHex() method.mlhartme

Compile for Java 6 now.mlhartme

Dump io.Misc because it's obsolete with Java 6.mlhartme

Dump util.Misc.getXercesNames.mlhartme

Added Buffer.fill(InputStream in, Buffer, int start, int max, boolean[] eof).mlhartme

Added xml.ChildElements.mlhartme

Added xml.Namespace.mlhartme

Added xml.Builder.element() and textElement with Namespacemlhartme

Dump Life support, it's part of pustefix now.mlhartme

Added default implementation fs.Node.move() that uses copy and delete.mlhartme

Node.readBytres() optimized by overriding the default implmenetation in various sub-classes.mlhartme

Node.append() now implemeneted for all filesystems.mlhartme

Node.length() clarified: now throws an exception when not applied to a file.mlhartme

Node.list() clarified: throws an exception if this does not exist.mlhartme

MemoryNode.list() fixed.mlhartme

Node.digestBytes() added to obtain raw bytes.mlhartme

Node.close() clarified: closing more than once is ok, but read/write on closed stream is not ok.mlhartme

Node.diff() fixed: avoid reading from closed string; add missing close.mlhartme

Node.link(), isLink(), mklink() and readLink() added.mlhartme

FileNode.isLink() returns true for broken links now.mlhartme

FileNode.exists() return true for broken links now.mlhartme

Link support for filters.mlhartme

Node creation changes.mlhartme

Moved META-INF/sushi/filesystem to META-INF/de/ui/sushi/filesystem to avoid collision with Sushi 1.xmlhartme

Optional filesystem: silently ignore filesystem instantiation problems if the classname is marked with a star. Needed to support optional dependencies.mlhartme

Filesystem.getFeatures() to programmatically check available features.mlhartme

Filesystem.SEPARATOR renamed to SCHEME_SEPARATOR.mlhartme

Filesystem.getName() renamed to getScheme().mlhartme

Filesystem can be used for multiple schemes now.mlhartme

ZipNodes use URI to reference the underlying file now.mlhartme

ZipNode.length() implementation added.mlhartme

ZipNode.exists() and isDirectory() fixed for root node (ake empty path): properly return true now.mlhartme

WebdavNode added.mlhartme

HttpNode dumped. Use WebdavNode instead.mlhartme

ResourceNode dumped. Use IO.resource() instead.mlhartme

SshNode.isFile() and isDirectory() properly propagate exceptions now.mlhartme
